overview_of_class: Whole-Body Thinking: Partnered Swing Dancing as Source of Collaborative Decision-Making In this approach to swing dancing, the goal is for two people to join hands and use the rhythms they hear in swinging, jazz-rhythm-based music as a means of connecting with each other in both motion and emotion. The partners make these connections physically through the hands; visually through the eyes; and vocally by scat-singing wordless rhythms that reflect the beat of the music they hear playing.
name: Jazz l
subject: DANCE
